name: part_011
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】ねぽらぼ学園 ☆5周年記念！！輝く学寮祭☆【#ねぽらぼ5周年学祭3Dライブ】 [-7fWewjcygo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: The members of Nepolabo have a conversation on stage after realizing they forgot to perform their new song. They quickly decide to perform it for the fans who are still watching.
Nepolabo performs their new song 'Hitotsu ni Naru Koe' (Voices Becoming One).

subtitles.original: ねねたち、あんなに練習したのに〜っ！！
subtitles.english: We practiced so much!!

subtitles.original: 作ったのはいいけど……「出すタイミングどうしよう」って言ってたら、
subtitles.english: We made it, but while we were saying, "When should we bring it out?"

subtitles.original: 完全に忘れてた……
subtitles.english: I completely forgot...

subtitles.original: 出すタイミング絶対にここだったな〜
subtitles.english: The timing to bring it out was definitely right here.

subtitles.original: もうステージ真っ暗だし〜〜〜！
subtitles.english: The stage is already dark!

subtitles.original: ……お客さん、まだいてくれてる、かな……
subtitles.english: I wonder if the audience... is still there for us...

subtitles.original: ……大丈夫！
subtitles.english: It's okay!

subtitles.original: 今なら、まだ……ギリギリ間に合う！！
subtitles.english: We can still... just barely make it now!!

subtitles.original: ねぇ、そこの君！！まだ……見ててくれるよね？
subtitles.english: Hey, you there! You're still... watching, right?

subtitles.original: ねねたちの、新しい曲──聞いてくれる？
subtitles.english: Will you listen to... our new song?

subtitles.original: うん、うん……きっと、聞いてくれるって信じてる！
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah... I'm sure they'll listen, I believe it!

subtitles.original: 最後まで一緒に盛り上がっていこうね！
subtitles.english: Let's get hyped together until the very end!

subtitles.original: それでは──改めて……んっん……
subtitles.english: Well then—once again... *ahem*...

subtitles.original: 聞いてください──ねぽらぼの新曲です
subtitles.english: Please listen to it—Nepolabo's new song.

subtitles.original: この先、みんなとなら、どこまでも行けると願って──歌います
subtitles.english: With the hope that we can go anywhere with everyone from now on... we sing.

subtitles.original: 5周年──その先の未来もずっと一緒に見守り……歩んでください
subtitles.english: 5th Anniversary—please continue to watch over us and walk with us into the future.

subtitles.original: 1人じゃ辿り着けない場所へ……みんなで──
subtitles.english: To the place we can't reach alone... all together—

subtitles.original: ひとつになる声
subtitles.english: Voices becoming one.

subtitles.original: 暗闇の中で 見つけた声
subtitles.english: A voice found in the darkness

subtitles.original: そのしるべを 辿りながら
subtitles.english: Following that signpost

subtitles.original: 僕らは
subtitles.english: We...

subtitles.original: 走るよ
subtitles.english: Are running

subtitles.original:
ひとつになる声
歌：ねぽらぼ
作詞・作曲・編曲：中野領太
subtitles.english:
Voices Becoming One
Song by: Nepolabo
Lyrics, Music & Arrangement: Ryota Nakano

subtitles.original: ひとりぼっちだった日
subtitles.english: Days when I was all alone

subtitles.original: 先見えなかった日
subtitles.english: Days when I couldn't see ahead

subtitles.original: だけど君と出会えて
subtitles.english: But after meeting you

subtitles.original: そっと 扉を開けた
subtitles.english: I gently opened the door

subtitles.original: 手のひらの中に また1を足して
subtitles.english: Adding another '1' into my palm

subtitles.original: 何度も 奇跡を叶えよう
subtitles.english: Let's make miracles happen over and over

subtitles.original: 澄み渡る空の彼方
subtitles.english: Beyond the crystal clear sky

subtitles.original: 太陽と踊る 羽になる
subtitles.english: Becoming wings that dance with the sun

subtitles.original: 情熱が突き動かす
subtitles.english: Passion drives us

subtitles.original: 僕らの明日を
subtitles.english: Our tomorrow

subtitles.original: 照らして
subtitles.english: Illuminate it

subtitles.original: 同じ夢を駆ける僕らは 強く心を結んで
subtitles.english: Running towards the same dream, we bind our hearts strongly

subtitles.original: 世界の果て どこにでも行けるから
subtitles.english: To the end of the world, we can go anywhere

subtitles.original: これからまた続いていく道 1人じゃ辿り着けない
subtitles.english: The road that continues from now on, I can't reach it alone

subtitles.original: だから この背中預けるよ
subtitles.english: So, I'll entrust my back to you

subtitles.original: 信じている 君の手を
subtitles.english: I believe in your hand

subtitles.original: 僕らの未来を
subtitles.english: Our future

subtitles.original: みんなの声を
subtitles.english: Everyone's voice

subtitles.original: 君らしいって思う その積み重ねが
subtitles.english: I think it's just like you, those accumulations

subtitles.original: なぜか嬉しくなるの
subtitles.english: Somehow make me happy

subtitles.original: きっとこれからもそう
subtitles.english: Surely it'll be that way from now on too

subtitles.original: 手のひらの中の 大切な日々が
subtitles.english: The precious days in my palm

subtitles.original: たくさんの光を奏でて
subtitles.english: Playing so much light

subtitles.original: 君と笑った
subtitles.english: I laughed with you

subtitles.original: 始まりの時の願い
subtitles.english: The wish from when it started

subtitles.original: 今もほら輝いてる
subtitles.english: Look, it's still shining now

subtitles.original: 未来まで連れてゆこう
subtitles.english: Let's take it with us to the future

subtitles.original: 暗闇を抜けた先に
subtitles.english: At the end of the darkness

subtitles.original: みんなの笑顔
subtitles.english: Everyone's smiles

subtitles.original: 見つけた
subtitles.english: I found them

subtitles.original: 同じ夢を駆ける僕らは 強く心を結んで
subtitles.english: Running towards the same dream, we bind our hearts strongly

subtitles.original: 世界の果て どこにでも行けるから
subtitles.english: To the end of the world, we can go anywhere

subtitles.original: これからまた続いていく道 1人じゃ辿り着けない
subtitles.english: The road that continues from now on, I can't reach it alone

subtitles.original: だから この背中預けるよ
subtitles.english: So, I'll entrust my back to you

subtitles.original: 信じている 君の手を
subtitles.english: I believe in your hand

subtitles.original: 僕らの未来を
subtitles.english: Our future

subtitles.original: みんなの声を
subtitles.english: Everyone's voice

subtitles.original: ひとつに
subtitles.english: Becoming one

subtitles.original: みんなの声を
subtitles.english: Everyone's voice

subtitles.original: 重ねて
subtitles.english: Overlapping
